plain: Based on the user's favourite books, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is fantasy, their favourite kind of plot is complex and intricate, their favourite setting is a fictional world, their favourite writing style is descriptive and immersive, their favourite length is novel-length, their favourite topic is dragons and magic, their favourite pacing is slow and methodical, their favourite narrative structure is non-linear, and their favourite themes are identity, belonging, and the power of the individual.
